trial_identification.studytitle: Postural characterization of children between 7 and 8 years of age
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Postural characterisation of children between 7 and 8 years of age for asymmetry

conditioncode.conditioncode2: Normal musculoskeletal and cartilage development and function
Normal musculoskeletal and cartilage development and function

interventions.interventions: quantitative assessment of posture of head, shoulder (frontal and sagittal planes), scapula, thoracic kyphosis, lumbar lordosis, spine lateral deviation, pelvis, knee (frontal and sagittal planes), ankle, footprint, fingertip-to-floor test. Duration of observations was 20 minutes

primaryOutcome.outcome: postural deviations measured by the software CorelDraw and the bony landmarks

secondaryOutcome.outcome: flexibility measured with a ruler (fingertip-to-floor test)

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: healthy children, with Body Mass Index under 85th percentile (Cole, 2000), without spine lateral deviation in S, and that practice physic exercise no often than twice per week and/or than three hours per week
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: children with neuromuscular, musculoskeletal and heart-breath pathologies, with spine lateral deviation in S kind, with BMI above 85th percentile (Cole, 2000) and that practiced institucional sport or physcic exercise more than Physical Education, more often than twice per week and/or more than three hours per week

ethicsAndSummary.summary: During the infancy, the posture undergoes many adjustments related to growth stages due to changes of the body proportions. The formation of the body schema, in childhood, occurs through the motor experiences and allows the tonic-postural structuration, so the postural imbalance obtained in this period can last for the entire adolescence and adult life. The purpose of this study was to characterize quantitatively the posture of children between 7 and 8 years of age and to verify the difference between sex and age for the analyzed postural aspects.

BALDINI, Marina, PENHA, Patrícia Jundi, JOÃO, Sílvia Maria Amado Caracterização postural da coluna em crianças de 7-8 anos In: XXI Reunião Anual da Federação de Sociedades de Biologia Experimental RESUMO Nº 49.010, 2006, Águas de Lindóia. . , 2006.
2. BALDINI, Marina, PENHA, Patrícia Jundi, JOÃO, Sílvia Maria Amado Caracterização postural de pelve e coluna lombar em crianças de 7-8 anos In: 14º SIICUSP, 2006, Ribeirão Preto. . , 2006.
3. PENHA, Patrícia Jundi, JOÃO, Sílvia Maria Amado, BALDINI, Marina Caracterização quantitativa da escoliose em crianças de 7 e 8 anos da cidade de Amparo/SP In: 58ª Reunião anual da SBPC, 2006, Florianópolis. . , 2006.
PENHA, Patrícia Jundi, ONODERA, A. N., SACCO, I. C. N., JOÃO, Sílvia Maria Amado Correlação entre postura de tornozelo e impressão plantar de crianças de 7 e 8 anos In: XII Congresso Brasileiro de Biomecânica, 2007, São Pedro. Anais do XII Congresso Brasileiro de Biomecânica. , 2007. p.683 - 688
